Documentation

FAQ

Common questions about formats, permissions, performance, and roadmap-related behavior.

Does SnapTray upload my captures?

No. Capture, annotation, and recording workflows stay on your local device.

Which output format should I use?

  • MP4 for long videos and tutorials
  • GIF for short loops
  • WebP for lightweight animation snippets

Why is OCR unavailable on my system?

OCR availability depends on platform capabilities and installed language packs.

Can I customize default hotkeys?

Yes. Open Settings > Hotkeys and edit by category.

Can I use SnapTray from scripts?

Yes. The CLI supports local capture commands and IPC-based control.

Where should I report bugs?

Open an issue on the GitHub repository with OS version, app version, and reproducible steps.

SnapTray

Desktop-grade screenshot and recording workflows, designed for speed and clarity.

Made with Qt 6 and C++17
